news.Title: [AI Summary] 采鈺11月營收年減8.42% 股價近一週上漲2.70%
news.Content: • 采鈺11月合併營收為7.84億元，年減8.42% [1]。, • 股價變動無相關重大新聞報導，過去一週股價變動幅度為 2.70%。 【綜合分析】 參考來源：Yahoo奇摩股市: 1則 | 資料期間：2025-12-10 至 2025-12-10 | 新聞數量：1 則 光學元件廠采鈺 (6789) 公布最新營運數據，公司於2025年12月10日公告，2025年11月合併營收達到7.84億元，相較於去年同期呈現年減8.42% [1]。此營收表現可能受到市場需求波動或產業景氣影響，具體原因需進一步觀察公司後續說明。 儘管面臨營收下滑的挑戰，采鈺的股價近期卻呈現上漲趨勢。根據股價資訊，截至2025年12月31日，采鈺的最新收盤價為285.00元，較前一日的284.50元上漲0.50元，漲幅為0.18%。進一步觀察，近一週股價累計上漲2.70%，顯示市場對該公司的評價並未因單月營收數據而明顯受挫。五日前（2025年12月23日）收盤價為277.50元，顯示股價自12月下旬以來持續有回升力道。 目前除了11月營收公告外，無其他重大營運消息。市場將持續關注采鈺後續的營收表現以及公司在先進光學元件領域的發展動態，以評估其長期的投資價值。

news.Title: [AI Summary] VisEra's November Revenue Down 8.42% YoY, Stock Rose 2.70% This Week
news.Content: • VisEra announced its November consolidated revenue reached NT$784 million, a year-on-year decrease of 8.42% [1]., • No significant news reports related to price movement. Weekly price change was 2.70%. [Analysis] Sources: Yahoo Finance Stock: 1 | Period: 2025-12-10 to 2025-12-10 | News Count: 1 Optical component manufacturer VisEra (6789) has released its latest operational data. On December 10, 2025, the company announced that its consolidated revenue for November 2025 reached NT$784 million, representing a year-on-year decrease of 8.42% compared to the same period last year [1]. This revenue performance may be influenced by market demand fluctuations or industry economic conditions, with specific reasons requiring further observation from the company's subsequent explanations. Despite facing the challenge of declining revenue, VisEra's stock price has shown an upward trend recently. According to stock price information, as of December 31, 2025, VisEra's latest closing price was NT$285.00, an increase of NT$0.50 from the previous day's NT$284.50, a gain of 0.18%. Further observation shows that the stock price has risen by a cumulative 2.70% over the past week, indicating that the market's valuation of the company has not been significantly affected by the single month's revenue data. The closing price on December 23, 2025, was NT$277.50, suggesting a continued upward momentum in the stock price since late December. Currently, apart from the November revenue announcement, there is no other significant operational news. The market will continue to monitor VisEra's subsequent revenue performance and the company's development in advanced optical components to assess its long-term investment value.

閒置募集資金是指上市公司透過發行股票或債券等方式募集到，但未投入至原定投資項目，或投資項目進度暫停及放緩，而暫時處於閒置狀態的資金。這些閒置資金可能被用來購買理財產品、補充流動資金、甚至暫時借給其他需要用錢的單位，以免資金閒置造成浪費，但也必須確保不影響投資項目的實施，且符合監管要求。
